Advanced ASIC Design & Verification

Master SystemVerilog and UVM to verify IP, subsystems, and SoCs. Build testbenches, assertions, coverage, and regressions on industry‚Äëstyle designs.

Skills Covered

  • SystemVerilog & UVM
  • Assertions (SVA), functional & code coverage
  • Constrained‚Äërandom & directed testing
  • VIP integration, scoreboards, checkers
  • Regressions, debug & coverage closure

Projects

  • APB/AXI VIP with assertions & coverage
  • NoC Router Design & Verification
  • RISC‚ÄëV Verification + FPGA realization
  • I2C/SPI/UART with error injection

Job Roles

  • Design Verification Engineer
  • VIP Engineer
  • UVM Methodology Engineer

Career Pathway

Trainee ‚Üí Junior DV ‚Üí DV Engineer ‚Üí Senior DV ‚Üí DV Lead

Physical Design

Learn digital back‚Äëend flow from floorplanning through sign‚Äëoff. Practice timing closure, power optimization, DRC/LVS, and ECO methodologies.

  • Floorplanning, placement, clock‚Äëtree synthesis
  • Routing, optimization, congestion analysis
  • STA, timing closure, MCMM
  • DRC/LVS, antenna, IR/EM checks
  • ECO flows & tape‚Äëout readiness

  • Block‚Äëlevel PnR and timing closure
  • CTS & skew optimization
  • ECO implementation & sign‚Äëoff checks

  • STA Engineer
  • Sign‚Äëoff/Integration Engineer

FPGA‚ÄëBased System Design

Design, integrate, and validate FPGA subsystems using Verilog/SystemVerilog and vendor IP. Implement DMA/AXI pipelines and real‚Äëtime processing on boards.

Skills Covered

  • RTL coding, constraints & timing
  • IP integration, AXI/DMA, memory‚Äëmapped I/O
  • On‚Äëboard debug (ILA/Chipscope)
  • Image/signal processing & acceleration

Projects

  • ISP pipeline on FPGA
  • AXI DMA frame buffer & display
  • DDR4, PCIe, ADC/DAC, Camera Interface
  • Realtime image signal processing

Job Roles

  • FPGA Design/Validation Engineer
  • Hardware Accelerator Engineer
  • Prototyping/Bring‚Äëup Engineer

Advanced Embedded Systems Design

Develop firmware for microcontrollers and embedded Linux. Build drivers, RTOS tasks, connectivity stacks, and production‚Äëgrade diagnostics.

Skills Covered

  • Embedded C/C++, HALs, peripheral drivers
  • RTOS (tasks, queues, ISRs)
  • Bootloaders, firmware update & logging
  • Linux drivers, Yocto basics, device tree
  • Connectivity: UART/SPI/I2C, BLE/Wi‚ÄëFi/IoT

Projects

  • Sensor hub with RTOS & low‚Äëpower modes
  • STM32 driver suite with unit tests
  • Linux char driver with sysfs & ioctl
  • Jetson AI accel, Qt apps, CUDA basics

Job Roles

  • Embedded Firmware Engineer
  • Device Driver Engineer
  • Embedded Linux Engineer

Career Pathway

Trainee ‚Üí Jr. ES ‚Üí ES Engineer ‚Üí Sr. ES ‚Üí Lead

Analog Circuit Design

Design core analog IP and validate performance across corners. Practice low‚Äënoise, low‚Äëpower techniques and mixed‚Äësignal integration.

Skills Covered

  • CMOS, biasing, op‚Äëamps, comparators
  • Bandgaps, LDOs, PLL basics
  • Noise, mismatch, Monte‚ÄëCarlo & corners
  • Layout‚Äëaware design & parasitics
  • Mixed‚Äësignal verification hand‚Äëoff

Projects

  • Two‚Äëstage op‚Äëamp with compensation
  • Low‚Äëpower comparator with hysteresis
  • Simple PLL behavioral model

Job Roles

  • Analog Design Engineer
  • Mixed‚ÄëSignal Integration Engineer

Analog Layout Design

Create robust custom layouts with matching, shielding, and parasitic awareness. Achieve clean DRC/LVS and reliable extraction for sign‚Äëoff.

Skills Covered

  • Device matching, common‚Äëcentroid techniques
  • Guard rings, shielding, routing strategies
  • DRC/LVS closure, PEX & EM/IR basics
  • Floorplanning for analog macros

Projects

  • Matched differential pair & current mirror
  • Capacitor array with DNL/INL
  • Post‚Äëlayout PEX verification

Job Roles

  • Analog Layout Engineer
  • Custom Layout/Physical Verification Engineer

Career Pathway
